name: Archer Maclean's Super Dropzone
overview: Turn on, tune in, Drop Zone!Strap yourself in for the experience of a lifetime - legendary programmer Archer McLean's chart-topping mother of all blast'em ups, fully updated and enhanced to blow its way into the Nineties and beyond! It's a battle of the planets, featuring massive levels loaded wave after wave of enemies and outlandish level bosses. The most playable game in the galaxy, Super Drop Zone will leave you for dead.
